member.name: IAMVfwCaptureDialogs.HasDialog

summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer, , and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation. Those features have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer, IMFMediaEngine and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The HasDialog method determines if the specified dialog box exists in the driver.

member.param: Desired dialog box. This is a member of the enumeration.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if the driver contains the dialog box or S_FALSE otherwise.

member.name: IAMVfwCaptureDialogs.SendDriverMessage

summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer, , and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation. Those features have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer, IMFMediaEngine and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The SendDriverMessage method sends a driver-specific message.

member.param: Handle of the driver dialog box. This is a member of the enumeration.
Message to send to the driver.
member.returns: Return value varies depending on the implementation within each driver.

member.name: IAMVfwCaptureDialogs.ShowDialog

summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer, , and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation. Those features have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer, IMFMediaEngine and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The ShowDialog method displays the specified VFW dialog box.

member.param: Dialog box to display. This is a member of the enumeration.
Handle of the dialog box's parent window.

returns.para: Returns an HRESULT value. Possible values include the following.

listheader.description: Could not reconnect with the new format.
The filter graph is not stopped.

summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer, , and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation. Those features have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer, IMFMediaEngine and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The IAMVfwCaptureDialogs interface displays a dialog box provided by a Video for Windows (VFW) capture driver.
The VFW Capture filter implements this interface. Applications can use it to display one of the three dialog boxes (Source, Format, or Display) provided by VFW capture drivers.
